# Links

-   [Color](#color)
-   [Base64](#base-64)

## Color

```JavaScript
const red = new Color(0xff0000);
const darkenRed = red.darken(0.1);

console.log(red.toString()); // 'rgb(255, 0, 0)'
console.log(darkenRed.toString()); // 'rgb(230, 0, 0)'
```

## [Base 64](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Base64)

```JavaScript
const encoded = Base64.encode('Man is distinguished, not only by his reason, but by this singular passion from other animals, which is a lust of the mind, that by a perseverance of delight in the continued and indefatigable generation of knowledge, exceeds the short vehemence of any carnal pleasure.');
const decoded = Base64.decode(encoded);

console.log(encoded);
/*  */

console.log(decoded);
/*
'Man is distinguished, not only by his reason, but by this singular passion from other animals, which is a lust of the mind, that by a perseverance of delight in the continued and indefatigable generation of knowledge, exceeds the short vehemence of any carnal pleasure.'
*/
```
